videos.title: M.I.A. 'Bad Girls' (2012)
videos.description: M.I.A.'s "Bad Girls" music video is a visually stunning showcase of Saudi-inspired car stunts, with drifting vehicles on two wheels and empowered women in a desert setting, blending Middle Eastern cultural elements with modern rebellion. Directed by Romain Gavras, the video highlights themes of female empowerment and defiance, all set against a backdrop of high-octane action and surreal imagery.
videos.additional_info:
M.I.A. 'Bad Girls' (2012)
M.I.A.'s "Bad Girls" music video is a visually stunning showcase of Saudi-inspired car stunts, with drifting vehicles on two wheels and empowered women in a desert setting, blending Middle Eastern cultural elements with modern rebellion. Directed by Romain Gavras, the video highlights themes of female empowerment and defiance, all set against a backdrop of high-octane action and surreal imagery.

videos.title: Sabrina Carpenter - Espresso (2024)
videos.description: The music video for Sabrina Carpenter's song "Espresso," released in 2024, was directed by Dave Meyers. The video features vibrant and sun-soaked visuals, showcasing Carpenter in various stylish outfits as she navigates a dreamy, retro-inspired setting. With a playful and energetic vibe, the video highlights Carpenter's charisma and the song's catchy, upbeat nature. The creative direction was managed by Jacobi Mehringer and Anna Arnell, adding to the video's polished and dynamic aesthetic.
videos.additional_info:
Sabrina Carpenter - Espresso (2024)
The music video for Sabrina Carpenter's song "Espresso," released in 2024, was directed by Dave Meyers. The video features vibrant and sun-soaked visuals, showcasing Carpenter in various stylish outfits as she navigates a dreamy, retro-inspired setting. With a playful and energetic vibe, the video highlights Carpenter's charisma and the song's catchy, upbeat nature. The creative direction was managed by Jacobi Mehringer and Anna Arnell, adding to the video's polished and dynamic aesthetic.

videos.title: Ken Carson - Fighting My Demons (2023)
videos.description: The music video for "Fighting My Demons" by Ken Carson, directed by Cole Bennett, was released in 2023 and features unique, glitchy visuals. The video presents a series of grainy, 3D footage that gives off the impression of being shot with night-vision goggles, offering a surreal viewing experience. It mainly showcases Ken Carson partying and performing his lyrics, creating a montage that aligns with the song's themes. The video's eerie and dark aesthetics were noted for drawing inspiration from the style of 1990s Japanese cinema, culminating in a profound, existential moment where Ken faces a haunting black void, adding depth and narrative to the visual experience.
videos.additional_info:
Ken Carson - Fighting My Demons (2023)

It mainly showcases Ken Carson partying and performing his lyrics, creating a montage that aligns with the song's themes. The video's eerie and dark aesthetics were noted for drawing inspiration from the style of 1990s Japanese cinema, culminating in a profound, existential moment where Ken faces a haunting black void, adding depth and narrative to the visual experience.

Director - Cole Bennett

A mesmerizing music video featuring a chaotic journey initiated by Diplo's spiked chicken nugget, showcasing wild camera angles, unusual characters, and intense visual effects set in a quirky vintage Chinese restaurant. Director Seaman's close collaboration with Francis ensures a deep connection with the song's rhythms and lyrics, bringing to life a vividly demented world that captivates viewers, with or without the influence of LSD.

videos.title: Whiplash (2014)
videos.description: "Whiplash" is a 2014 film directed by Damien Chazelle, known for its intense portrayal of the relationship between a young jazz drummer and his demanding music instructor. Chazelle's dynamic direction in "Whiplash" earned him widespread acclaim, showcasing his ability to create tension and deliver a gripping narrative within the context of a music-driven story.

videos.title: Watchtower of China (2022)
videos.description: A cinematic exploration capturing the vast diversity and spirit of China through seamless edits and fluid camera work over five years of filming and editing. The project, which extends Dalessandri's unique visual storytelling seen in "Watchtower of Turkey," presents a rich tapestry of China's landscapes, people, and culture, set to the emotive compositions of Ezio Bosso. The film is acclaimed for its vibrant portrayal and deep personal vision of China, reflecting the interconnected energy of its inhabitants and their surroundings.
videos.additional_info:

The project, which extends Dalessandri's unique visual storytelling seen in "Watchtower of Turkey," presents a rich tapestry of China's landscapes, people, and culture, set to the emotive compositions of Ezio Bosso. videos.title: Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
videos.additional_info:
Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)

videos.alt_text: Duda Beat feat. Trevo - Nem Um Pouquinho
videos.title: Duda Beat feat. Trevo - Nem Um Pouquinho (2021)
videos.description: Duda Beat's single "Nem Um Pouquinho" featuring Trevo presents a cyberpunk and dystopian universe where she plays a metamorphic creature seeking revenge in a bitter heartbreak narrative. The video complements this theme with a fantastic approach, featuring urban arts, signage, and vehicles developed by the production design team, while the barbed rose symbolizes fatal charm throughout the project.
videos.additional_info:

videos.alt_text: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished
videos.title: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
videos.description: The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot would be categorized as an overhead stop motion duplication conveyor shot to cut-in. A cut-in is literally when we "cut-in" from a wider shot to a closer shot. It's a staple of Wes Anderson and Edgar Wright. The stop-motion in this scene is subtle but enough to be catalogued.
videos.additional_info:
adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot would be categorized as an overhead stop motion duplication conveyor shot to cut-in. A cut-in is literally when we "cut-in" from a wider shot to a closer shot. It's a staple of Wes Anderson and Edgar Wright. The stop-motion in this scene is subtle but enough to be catalogued.
Technique - Conveyor , Cut-ins , Overhead , Stop Motion
Director - Manu Cossu
DOP - Mattias Rudh
Editor - Christie Brown, Gian Buazulli
Colorist - Company 3, Tom Poole

videos.title: Inter Alia (Short Film) (2023)
videos.description: A musician is given everything. Money, fame, & more...but sometimes our dreams are just nightmares. After you arrive to your success, what comes next? Can you still find who you are after losing yourself? Is any of this even real?
